content: round 8 k 40 sts round 9 *k2 k2tog* 30 sts sometimes i stop here and say whatever it s close enough to being done… lol round 10 k 30 sts round 11 * k1 k2tog* 20 sts round 12 *k2tog* 10 sts sometimes i stop here knowing that i can just weave in the ends and close up any holes… round 13 k 10 sts break yarn leaving a 12 tail using a wool needle weave tail though remaining stitches pull tight to close weave in ends i prefer steam blocking under a towel to really get the slouch going and to define the stitches don t forget to tag your favorite indie dyer on social media #myfavoriteslouchy page 3 of 3
